allow:
Bash(git commit --amend -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Complete EDM v0.4.0 SDK implementation

Features:
- All 10 EDM domains with Zod validation schemas
- LLM extraction using Anthropic Claude for 5 domains \(core, constellation, milky_way, gravity, impulse\)
- Auto-population for 5 domains \(meta, governance, telemetry, system, crosswalks\)
- Stateless mode for privacy-preserving session use
- Comprehensive validation with detailed error reporting
- Crosswalk mapping to Plutchik and HMD taxonomies
- Text + image fusion support

Field reconciliation from system-prompt-B.ts to canonical v0.4:
- archetype_energy -> narrative_archetype
- meaning_inference -> expressed_insight
- transcendent_moment -> transformational_pivot
- reentry_score -> recurrence_pattern \(type change\)
- Removed: active_motivational_state, media_context, memory_layers, tether_target
- Added: somatic_signature

Tests: 77 passing across 5 test suites

Documentation:
- EXTRACTION_VS_INFERENCE.md - Interpretation boundary
- EU_AI_ACT_COMPLIANCE.md - Regulatory compliance guide
- ARCHITECTURE.md - System design
EOF
\)")
